description: The video series for a new generation of driving enthusiasts. Exclusive videos featuring: new car tests, sports, news, previews, shows, events, tech tips, extreme action and more!
title: Driving Sports TV

episodes.title: Launch Control: Rally America Sno*Drift
episodes.description: For 2014 the slate is once again wiped clean. Both the Subaru Rally Team USA and Subaru Rallycross Teams have new cars and new challenges ahead. Join us as we once again bring you the inside story on Season 2 of Launch Control. #launchcontroltv In this episode the Subaru Rally Team USA prepares for a battle in the cold Michigan snow at the Sno*Drift rally.

episodes.title: How-to perform a basic oil change
episodes.description: Changing your own oil is both cheap and easy. Ryan shows you how on a 2004 Mazda3 2.0.

episodes.title: X Games Gymkhana Grid in Slow Motion
episodes.description: Top drivers from around the world practice for the first Gymkhana Grid competition at X Games 2013 in Los Angeles. Featuring Ken Block, Tanner Foust, David Higgins, Liam Doran and others. Filmed during practice.

episodes.title: X Games Gymkhana Grid Course Preview
episodes.description: A preview of the 2013 X Games Gymkhana Grid course with David Higgins of the Subaru Rally Team USA.

episodes.title: New England Forest Rally 2013: Quick and Dirty Stage Reel
episodes.description: Raw stage action from the 2013 New England Forest Rally. Featuring Ken Block, David Higgins, Rifat Sungkar, Antoine L'Estage and many others. Look for the full event feature coming in August!

episodes.title: Evolution X Rally Test in Quadvision
episodes.description: A couple days ago we brought you Rifat Sungkar’s test day, prior to the New England Forest Rally. Now, watch an entire lap of the course from four different angles simultaneously. That’s right, we’re bringing it to you in Quadvision!

episodes.title: Launch Control S01E08 - Nothing Comes Easy
episodes.description: Following a devastating setback, the Subaru Rally Team USA attempts a massive comeback at the Susquehannock Trail Pro Rally. Plus, the Subaru Puma Rallycross Team heads to Germany for more X Games Global Rallycross action.

episodes.title: New England Forest Rally 2013 Evolution X Test
episodes.description: Indonesian Rally Champion Rifat Sungkar, driver for the Fastron World Rally Team, prepares his Mitsubishi Evolution X for the New England Forest Rally in Maine.

episodes.title: Launch Control S01E07 - When it Rains it Poors
episodes.description: The Global Rallycross season kicks off for the Subaru Puma Rallycross Team, as Bucky Lasek, Dave Mirra, and Sverre Isachsen head overseas for X Games Barcelona. After a test session in the picturesque Monterrat area of Spain, its time to hit the track in anger for the first time this season. However, nobody was expecting the sequence of events that would transpire on race day.

episodes.title: Mitsubishi vs. the Mountain: Pikes Peak 2013
episodes.description: Mitsubishi fields a pair of MiEV Evolution II electric racers to challenge the mountain in the 91st running of the Pikes Peak International Hillclimb competition. Drivers Greg Tracy and Hiroshi Masuoka attempt both a class and overall win versus rally legend Sebastian Loeb, last year's winner Rhys Millen, local favorite Paul Dallenbach and hillclimb pioneer Nobuhiro "Monster" Tajima.

episodes.title: Pikes Peak 2013 Electric Preview
episodes.description: Running a pair of MiEV Evolution II Electric race cars, Mitsubishi drivers Hiroshi Masuoka and Greg Tracy are looking for no less than a class win at this year's Pikes Peak International Hillclimb in Colorado Springs, Colorado. These aren't anything like the electrics you see on the city streets, these are the ultimate in high-torque high-tech. Both cars are powered by no less than four electric motors putting out 533 effective horsepower. Competition is on Sunday, June 30. Other noted competitors include hillclimb legends Nobuhiro "Monster" Tajima, as well as Rod (Electric) and Rhys (Unlimited) Millen. This year also sees Peugeot returning to The Peak, with an Unlimited class gas-powered car driven by WRC Champion Sebastian Loeb.

episodes.title: Launch Control S01E06 - A Tale of Two Cities
episodes.description: In this episode, David Higgins and Subaru Rally Team USA are on the west coast for the Oregon Trail Rally, while Bucky Lasek, Dave Mirra, Sverre Isachsen and the Subaru PUMA Rallycross Team are hard at work in Connecticut testing the new cars in preparation for the first overseas event.

episodes.title: Launch Control S01E05 - David vs. Goliath
episodes.description: David Higgins and Craig Drew of Subaru Rally Team USA may be back-to-back champions, but at the Rally in the 100 Acre Wood, Ken Block has been king. A win here at round two for Higgins would rock the boat and shake things up for the rest of the series. But, an overnight storm in Missouri has dumped snow on the high-speed stages, placing the whole outcome into question. Can the teams keep it on the road in the treacherous conditions? Can Higgins and Drew get their first career win at this event?

episodes.title: Launch Control S01E04 - Buck Up
episodes.description: Subaru PUMA Rallycross Team driver, Bucky Lasek, visits Vermont to get sideways with Formula D driver Ryan Tuerck on the snow covered forest roads, and drops in at Vermont SportsCar to check out his new rallycross car and show the team his gratitude. Meanwhile the Subaru Rally Team USA is in Missouri testing for the highspeed Rally in the 100 Acre Wood, where Mother Nature throws competitors a curve ball.

episodes.title: X Games Rallycross: Taste of Barcelona
episodes.description: Highlights from our recent trip to Barcelona, Spain, to cover X Games Rallycross (part of the Global Rallycross Championship). Featuring Carlos Sainz, Tanner Foust, Dave Mirra, Bucky Lasek, Sverre Isachsen and Liam Doran.

episodes.title: Launch Control S01E03 - Blank Sheet pt. 2
episodes.description: Episode 2 left off with the Subaru Rally Team USA facing an overnight rebuild after a crash on the first day of Sno*Drift Rally 2013. The mechanics had a long night ahead of them to get the car back in action. Would the car be ready? Could Higgins and Drew hold on to their slim lead? Episode 3 has the answers.

episodes.title: Glorious Sounds of the Rockstar WRC05
episodes.description: Antoine L'Estage driving the Mitsubishi Lancer WRC05 before it had its season-ending off in Special Stage 9 at the 2013 Oregon Trail Rally. (Both driver and co-driver were unharmed.) This is nothing but 1.5-minutes of fast passes and the marvelous sounds of a WRC-spec engine. Tasty!

episodes.title: Ken Block Throwing Rocks: Hoonigan at OTR
episodes.description: Extra Ken Block + [Hoonigan] Racing footage we had sitting around from the 2013 Oregon Trail Rally. We cut it together with only the sweet sweet sounds of that WRC-spec engine for your listening pleasure. Includes test footage as well as select Day 1-3 stages.

episodes.title: 2013 Oregon Trail Rally: Dust and Glory
episodes.description: Follow the Indonesian Rally Champion Rifat Sungkar and the Fastron World Rally Team as they compete in the brutal 3-day Oregon Trail Rally. Includes Ken "Hoonigan" Block, Antoine "Van Damme" L'Estage, David Higgins of the Subaru Rally Team USA and others.

episodes.title: Fastron World Rally Team - Oregon Trail Rally SS13
episodes.description: In-car video from the Fastron World Rally Team at the 2013 Oregon Trail Rally. Driver Rifat Sungkar (twitter: @rifato), Co-Driver Marshall Clarke. Filmed on Sunday, May 5, 2013 on Special Stage 13 near Dufur, Oregon.

episodes.title: Mitsubishi Evo X Rally Test with Rifat Sungkar - Oregon Trail Rally 2013
episodes.description: Indonesian Champion Rifat Sungkar tests his Mitsubishi Evolution X in preparation for the 2013 Oregon Trail Rally.

episodes.title: Launch Control S01E02 - Blank Sheet
episodes.description: In episode 2 of Launch Control (part 1 of a 2 part episode), Subaru Rally Team USA reunites in Michigan for the 2013 Sno*Drift Rally. This is a new beginning, a chance for a fresh story starting from a blank sheet.

episodes.title: Car Clips: 2013 Hyundai Veloster Turbo "Ultimate"
episodes.description: We point our camera at the 2013 Hyundai Veloster Turbo. As equipped this car has a 201-hp 1.6-liter twin-scroll turbo, a 6-speed automatic transmission, the "Ultimate Pack" (inc. Panoramic Sunroof) and sells for just north of $26,000

episodes.title: MC2 Reviews: MINI Paceman
episodes.description: MC2 Magazine Technical Features Editor Jeff Zurchmeide drives the 2013 MINI Paceman through cones and mud. More about MINI: http://www.mc2magazine.com

episodes.title: Launch Control S01E01 - Rinse and Repeat - Subaru Rally
episodes.description: The new series following the Subaru Rally Team USA and the Subaru Puma Rallycross team as they fight for overall victory in 2013.

episodes.title: Car Clips: 2014 Mazda6
episodes.description: The 2014 Mazda6 gets highlighted in this stylized walk around. This sedan features Mazdas new Skyactiv 2.5-liter engine good for 184-hp and an EPA combined 30mpg . The Touring-spec model is $30,000 as equipped.

episodes.title: Car Clips: 2013 Volvo S60
episodes.description: Starting at $31,000 the 2013 Volvo S60 T5 (2.5-liter, inline 5, 250-hp) is a sophisticated choice in all-wheel drive Sport Sedans. In this, our first in the "Car Clips" series, we take you on a visual walk-around and highlight some of the main features of the car.

episodes.title: Rally School - Trailer
episodes.description: In this trailer for the upcoming feature "Rally School" you get to meet the three Subaru enthusiasts we put through the wringer over two days of class and competitions.

episodes.title: Subaru Crosstrek vs. Group-N Rally Car
episodes.description: A lifted crossover versus a pure-racing rally car? Yeah, we did that. Paul Eklund runs circles against a DirtFish Group-N Rally Car to find just how well the new XV Crosstrek can hold up under pressure.

episodes.title: 2013 Chevy Malibu LTZ Quick Drive
episodes.description: Ryan takes a quick spin in the new 2013 Chevy Malibu LTZ with the 2-liter turbo inline 4. The Malibu is, unfortunately, a car he finds lacking in many ways.

episodes.title: Beast Mode - Tex's Modified 1986 GL Wagon
episodes.description: A modified Subaru GL Wagon that will crush almost anything in its path. Produced by Driving Sports TV for Subiesport TV Episode 2.

episodes.title: 2013 Cadillac ATS V6 Tested
episodes.description: Ryan drives the 2013 Cadillac ATS 3.6 Premium Collection. Can Cadillac beat BMW at their own game with this $50,000 sport sedan? We put it through the wringer to find out.

episodes.title: 2014 Subaru Forester Hot Lap Review
episodes.description: Ryan does a hot lap in the 2014 Subaru Forester 2.0XT at the Inde Motorsport Ranch in Arizona. The in-car footage in this video is raw and uncut. Look for the complete review on the new Forester when Season 2 of Driving Sports TV kicks off in February.

episodes.title: 2014 Subaru Forester Preview
episodes.description: Recently, we flew down to Arizona to test the all-new 2014 Subaru Forester. Our driving impressions are still under embargo, so you'll have to wait a bit for the full review. For now, here's a preview featuring our exclusive interview with the project lead on the new Forester, Takuji Dai.

episodes.title: Subiesport Episode 2 Teaser
episodes.description: Teaser trailer for the new hit series from the producers of Driving Sports: Subiesport TV! Episode 2 coming in February 2013.

episodes.title: Kia Soul: Interpretive Dance Review
episodes.description: Ryan drives the 2012 Kia Soul. When we filmed this we thought attempting a review through "interpretive dance" was a good idea. In retrospect, we were probably wrong. The Soul + we tested had the 2.0-liter motor and is estimated to get 24/29mpg.

episodes.title: 2013 Audi S5 Driven
episodes.description: While on assignment in Colorado, Ryan fits in a quick refi of the 2013 Audi S5, a $67,000 coupe with Audi's legendary Quattro system and a supercharged 3.0 V6.

episodes.title: Holiday Special
episodes.description: Erica and Aaron take a pair of SUVs to the mountain as part of our annual holiday tradition.

episodes.title: Scion FR-S Drift Test
episodes.description: Ryan tests the 2013 Scion FR-S on the Dirtfish Skidpad. Normally, drifting a Scion FR-S would be like a fish to water, but something just isn't right here...

episodes.title: Global Rallycross in Slow-Motion: 2012 Final
episodes.description: Experience the 2012 GRC final round in slow-motion. Ken Block, Tanner Foust, Dave Mirra, Bucky Lasek and more take to the dirt, asphalt and air for the prize.

episodes.title: Ryan Attempts to Drift a Subaru BRZ (teaser)
episodes.description: A preview from Ryan's epic trip across the UK in the 2013 Subaru BRZ. Here, he attempts to drift the BRZ at the Harewood Hillclimb.

episodes.title: Episodes 6-13 Highlight Reel
episodes.description: Highlight reel featuring clips from Episodes 6-13 of Driving Sports TV Season 1.
